articles.author: Phil Stewart, Andrew Gray
articles.title: No new limits on Ukraine's use of US arms if North Korea joins fight, Pentagon says - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. will not impose new limits on Ukraine's use of American weapons if North Korea joins Russia's war, the Pentagon said on Monday, as NATO said North Korean military units had been deployed to the Kursk region in Russia.
articles.content: WASHINGTON/BRUSSELS, Oct 28 (Reuters) - The U.S. will not impose new limits on Ukraine's use of American weapons if North Korea joins Russia's war, the Pentagon said on Monday, as NATO said North Kor… [+5506 chars]

articles.author: Andrea Kane
articles.title: Added sugar lurks everywhere. 5 tips to help curb your intake - CNN
articles.description: Americans eat too much added sugar. But it’s hard to cut back because sugar lurks in many of our foods. These five tips can help.
